name: Lost Souls (AveragePiglet)
description:
Rouge-Like Dungeon Themed Shooter. You're a valiant Viking working your way through the Dungeons of Hell, gathering the Lost Souls of your Viking Brethren to help them find their way to Valhalla. Plus an infinite about of Randomly Generated Levels. 

Global Game Jam: https://globalgamejam.org/2021/games/lost-souls-0

This was made during the 48 Hour 2021 Global Game Jam. Created by Daniel Bresnahan, James Alison & myself (Reece Turner). Unlike the last Game Jam project such as "The Story of Yu", assets such as the UI, Models and Sound were Sourced Online.

Note: If the UI doesn't scale correctly to your Resolution, please navigate to the settings and use the Menu UI Scaling Slider to fix the issue.
